ai-tha-ap514:0.3_0: for the Elder Kappāyana (Vassakāra) on the Fruit of the Fruits of the Fruits
ai-tha-ap514:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap514:1.4_0: When did you ever find the fruit,
ai-tha-ap514:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap514:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap514:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kapilavatthu.
ai-tha-ap514:7.1_0: Out of the fruit of the Elder Nun Kanthaka
